Title: Provides that the low income housing tax credits shall be treated as overpayments of the applicable tax, to be credited or refunded
Summary: Provides that the low income housing tax credits shall be treated as overpayments of the applicable tax, to be credited or refunded.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing that the low income housing credit shall be treated as an overpayment of taxes
